title: Leavebustered after a 'Fatal Window's Error'
body:
Hey, it's happened again. Through computer crashes and I have been leavebustered. Here's a picture. Can't write this stuff.

Could I have this expunged? I have a very busy schedule as it is as the semester is in full swing now and waiting 20 minutes additionally basically means I won't be able to fix this until I go home for a holiday =/

I'd like to play some {{champion:83}}. I heard he's pretty cool now.

-Onwodori

replies.body:
Disconnections impact everyone in a match, regardless of the reason the disconnection happened. This is why disconnections are all treated equally by the [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) and why penalties cannot be modified or removed.

Memory_Management errors are typically related to problems with your RAM. I suggest consulting a techie friend or a local repair shop for further assistance.

Let me know if you have any questions.
